articles.author: Stephen Dziedzic
articles.title: Vladimir Putin's invasion of Ukraine neatly exposes the divisions and limitations of Quad nations - ABC News
articles.description: The Biden administration pushed for Quad nations to meet as part of its global effort to corral both allies and partners to isolate Russia in the wake of its invasion of Ukraine. While Japan and Australia have swung behind the campaign, India hasn't.
articles.content:
The leaders of the Quad nations have held a hastily arranged meeting to discuss the crisis in Ukraine.
The four Quad members Australia, India, the United States and Japan have drawn much closer in t… [+8154 chars]

articles.description: The Australian players are wearing black armbands in this game remembering the death of former wicketkeeper Rod Marsh.

articles.title: Australia's cricket team is in Pakistan for the first time in 24 years. Here's how local authorities plan to keep them safe - ABC News
articles.description: With Australia's cricket team in Pakistan for the first time in decades, the country is closing roads, surrounding their bus with armed troops and covering them from above with helicopters to keep them safe.
articles.content:
In Pakistan, cricket is practically a religion.
